Package com.gui.ehealt_v2

Class MakeAppointmentController

java.lang.Object
com.gui.ehealt_v2.MakeAppointmentController
public class MakeAppointmentController extends Object
Class to handle GUI, to make an appointment. The class uses the user holder to identify the user creating the appointment. Also, we have an SceneController to easily switch between the scenes. The timeList provides the possible times for the appointment and the radiusList provides the radius in km for the doctor search.
Author:
Viktor Benini; StudentID: 1298976 Doctor radius search and email sent as a reminder after appointments, Amalie Wilke, 1304925

  • Method Details

    • DoctorSearch

      protected void DoctorSearch() throws SQLException
      By tipping in the Searchbar doctors get selected by First or Lastname out of database. The Doctor and specification list are getting updated with the returned values.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • specificationSearch

      protected void specificationSearch() throws SQLException
      By tipping in the Searchbar specification the database. The Doctor list and Specification list are getting updated with the returned values.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onSpecificationMouseClick

      public void onSpecificationMouseClick() throws SQLException
      By clicking on an item in the specification list the selected value is set to the text field and all doctors with the similar specification are shown, by getting them out of the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • doctorListOnMouseClick

      protected void doctorListOnMouseClick() throws SQLException
      Class that puts selected doctor in textBox for later uses and enters the depending specialisation to the list
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • createAppointmentOnClick

      protected void createAppointmentOnClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException, javax.mail.MessagingException
      Method to create Appointment and inserts it into DB, by checking if all necessary fields are filled and parsing them into the appointment table in the database. Afterwards the table for the reminder is filled with the id of the created appointment, by querying the appointment out of the database, due to the auto created id. Then the sendMail function is called to send the user an email to confirm the creation of his appointment.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException
      javax.mail.MessagingException

    • sendAppointmentMail

      public void sendAppointmentMail() throws javax.mail.MessagingException
      send the appointmentMail to the user after finishing the created appointment, by querying the last created appointment and parsing it into the sendMail function of the MailUtility class. Required is the user-mail provided by the USerHolder, and the queried appointment.
      Throws:
      javax.mail.MessagingException

    • getDoctorInRadius

      public void getDoctorInRadius() throws SQLException
      The method is called when selecting a value out of the radiusComboBox. The method uses the spherical law to calculate the distance of the doctor to the user based on the latitude and longitude of both. The filtered doctors are than shown in the doctor list with the corresponding specification. Function that gets doctors in radius and clears list (Amalie), the magic here happens in SQL where I query with the spherical law of cosines
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • goBack

      public void goBack(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Class to switch back to mainPage after button click
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:

    • setAll

    • showAlert

      public static void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, javafx.stage.Window owner, String s, String alertmessage)
      Method is used to throw an alert, by opening a new window. The method needs the parameters AlertType which specific the alert reason the Window owner which parses the current window, and the Stage name as well as the alert massage shown in the window.
